name: Sites Radius
description: This element controls the boundary dimensions to be used for radius styling for a given block

elements.helpText: The value for the top left boundary
elements.label: Top left

elements.helpText: The value for the top right boundary
elements.label: Top right

elements.helpText: The value for the bottom left boundary
elements.label: Bottom left

elements.helpText: The value for the bottom right boundary
elements.label: Bottom right

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
